text: Nígbà tí ìyà sọ̀kalẹ̀ lé wọn lórí, wọ́n wí pé: “Mūsā, pe Olúwa rẹ fún wa nítorí àdéhùn tí Ó ṣe fún ọ. Dájúdájú tí o bá fi lè gbé ìyà náà kúrò fún wa (pẹ̀lú àdúà rẹ), dájúdájú a máa gbà ọ́ gbọ́, dájúdájú a sì máa jẹ́ kí àwọn ọmọ ’Isrọ̄’īl máa bá ọ lọ.”
